description:
O filme conta a historia de Xander Ronson, um mercenario que e contradado por um grupo para guia-los pelas montanhas da mongolia, na procura do Tangka, um artefato budista avaliado em 50 milhoes de dolares. Mas alem de mercenarios russos que tambem procuram o artefato, Ronson tera que enfrentar algo que nem mesmo ele imagina...

During the Soviet crack-down on religion in the 1930&#039;s, a priceless Buddhist artifact, a Tangka was taken across the border to China and hidden in the mountains. The diamonds alone, decorating this huge gold-inlaid textile, are thought to be worth $50 million. The fortune hunters need a guide and protection on the trip, so they hire an American ex-pat, Ronson. He&#039;s ex-Army and living an existence in Inner-Mongolia of drinks, women and bare-knuckle fights. The group takes off into the Mongolian mountains on a trek that will change their lives forever. For not only is this Tangka wanted by ruthless Russian mercenaries, but it&#039;s also protected by something much more sinister. Something that even Ronson can&#039;t imagine...


Enjoy... :)
